name: After the invasion
description:
This is my little entry for the Boss Rush Game Jam.
Most of it was made in less than 24 hrs, (will post a link to the timelapse video once it's up). 

The game isn't that fun, but it was fun to make! Looking forward to the next Boss Rush Jam. :)

For Updates, follow Go Go Galago Games on Itch.IO.

You can also follow us on Twitter at:
https://twitter.com/gogogalagogames

- Bot (Dani Felix)
